Package snake

Class Table

java.lang.Object
snake.Table
All Implemented Interfaces:
Drawable
public class Table extends Object implements Drawable
Represents a table used for the arcade game.
Author:
Ishan Pranav

    • contains

      public final boolean contains​(int row, int column)
      Determines whether the table's bounds contains the specified row and column.
      Parameters:
      row - The row.
      column - The column.
      Returns:
      true if the specified row and column are within the table's bounds; otherwise, false.
